attributes.action: build a train network in brecon wales
attributes.additional_details:
The town of Brecon in south wales is a beautiful place and is a much loved place for tourists as it boasts its beacons and its national park,
Brecon and its tourists would benefit hugely if they had a rail system currently the only way to travel there from other parts of the valleys is by bus and unfortunatly so many people who want to visit or live in Brecon are unable to use buses for so many reasons e.g anxiety claustrophobia etc, having trains that go to and from Brecon town would be amazing
